data.text: @FIONADONOHOE2 @NiamhDonohoe78 Well now dosnt that just speak volumes 🧐 that was a quick turn around

@FIONADONOHOE2 @NiamhDonohoe78 Oh. That's great news. I hope it's brought some relief.
💙

5 Tomorrow 3rd March we will go to Northern Ireland policing board in the hope of speaking to the @ChiefConPSNI concerning both PII and the decision to even put charges against us in the first place
We are forever grateful to #NoahsArmy âš¡for constantly standing with us
4 To mentally prepare for the interview in friday was, in itself a mental strain but we will go through anything for Noah.
3 The amount of resources to collect evidence on 2 people walking compared to the lack of resources given to the search and  investigation for beautiful Noah is not right.
2. This shows the absurdity of PSNI prosecuting 2 people on parade violations when 2 people were just going for a walk on the route  beautiful Noah was to take on 21st June 2020.
